title: Need help please
body:
so, i am using 17 inch monitor and 32 inch tv, it worked fine until...
i put the hdmi cable on a new 40 inch tv to watch movie, after i finished i put it back on my 32 inch tv, tried to play lol, but when the loading screen is supposed to come, i get bugsplat error and it wont conncet, when i use duplicate monitors, it uses my 17 inc monitor and then it works fine, also 16:3 wont fit anymore on my 32 and i have to use fit screen
any ideas? thank you in advance

also, how do i upload image of the bugsplat error?

replies.body: i have had a the similar problem but instead all i have done was changes out my old monitor with a new one... i deleted the config folder and it actually loaded in but as soon as game started it had a bugsplat error. every game i try it bugsplats

Hmm, sounds like your display settings got pretty wonky. Let's try a few things to correct this. First, [hop into your display settings](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html) and ensure you've set your resolution to whatever Windows recommends. Next, we'll work through steps necessary to reset your input file that stores your default resolution in League. 

>First, log into the game, then dive into your installation folder **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**

>Delete the folder named **CONFIG**, then hop into a custom match to see if the changes went through.

Let me know if this helped~
